ValidationRule.description: If there are pending supplements, require Pending Supplements text field and Approved Supplement question.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Are_there_Pending_Supplements__c ,"Yes") && ( ISBLANK( Pending_Supplements__c ) || ISBLANK(TEXT( Are_the_Supplements_Approved__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Required: Pending Supplements & Are the Supplements Approved?
